title: India's biggest concentrated solar tender likely this year
description: The tender will be issued by the end of this fiscal, Gupta said. SECI is the nodal agency for implementing the government's renewable energy projects. "There have been solar thermal tenders but not of this scale," Gupta told reporters on the sidelines of India Energy Storage Week 2024 organised by India Energy Storage Alliance.
